page.title: 20EDGEHEAD
page.content: THERE IS A BUILDERS MERCHANT IN THE VILLAGE. AT EITHER END OF THE VILLAGE THERE ARE FARM BUILDINGS. TO THE NORTH OF THE VILLAGE IS A DAIRY FARM. THE FARM TO THE SOUTH IS MAINLY ARABLE WITH A FEW SHEEP. THE SCHOOL IS TO THE SOUTH OF THE VILLAGE. IT IS A THREE TEACHER SCHOOL,MOST OF THE PUPILS COME FROM THE VILLAGE BUT SOME ARE BUSED IN FROM OUTLYING AREAS. THE OLDER COTTAGES WERE BUILT TO HOUSE FARM WORKERS BUT THESE HOUSES ARE NOW OWNED BY MAINLY PROFESSIONAL PEOPLE WHO COMMUTE INTO EDINBURGH. THE COTTAGES HAVE BEEN RENOVATED TO A VERY HIGH STANDARD BUT IN KEEPING WITH THEIR ORIGINAL DESIGN. THIS MAKES THEM VERY SOUGHT AFTER AND HAS PRICED MANY LOCAL PEOPLE OUT OF THE MARKET.
